dimensionsapprox: Approx. 4-3/4 x 2-3/4 x 1-11/16" (119.9 x 66.9 x     42.8mm) (W/H/D) excluding protrusions
mediatype: Memory Stick PRO Duo/Pro-HG Duo/PRO-HG HX Duo media     SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card
operatingsystemcompatibility: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit), Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7     SP1; Mac OS X (v10.3-v10.6), PMB is not compatible with Mac OS. Camera     (via USB), Image Data Converter and Image Data Lightbox software are     compatible with Mac OS.
noisereduction: Long Exposure NR: (On/Off, available at shutter speeds     longer than 1 second) High ISO NR: (High/Normal/Low)
antidust: Charge protection coating on Low-Pass Filter and     electromagnetic vibration mechanism
memorycardslot: Dual compatibility slot: Memory Stick PRO Duo/Pro-HG     Duo/PRO-HG HX Duo media - SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card
suppliedsoftware: PMB (Picture Motion Browser) v5.2; Image Data     Converter SR v3.2; Image Data Lightbox SR v2.2
brightnesscontrol: Auto, Manual (5 steps between -2 to +2), Sunny Weather
focussensitivity: 0 EV to +20 EV (at ISO100 conversion with F2.8 lens)
angleadjustment: Up: Approx. 90 degrees, Down: Approx. 45 degrees
focusarea: Multi Point AF (25 points), Center Weighted AF,     Flexible Spot AF
whitebalancemode: Auto,Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Incandescent,     Fluorescent, Flash, Setting the color temperature, Color Filter, Custom
flashmodes: Auto, Fill-flash, Slow Sync., Rear Sync., Hi-speed     sync., Wireless (with external flash), Off
braviasync: Yes, via HDMI with compatible BRAVIA HDTV
flashcoverage: FOV coverage up to 18 mm (in the focal length)
customization: Brightness: Auto, Manual, Sunny Weather; Display     Color: Black, White, Blue, Pink
afmodes: Single-shot AF(AF-S), Continuous AF(AF-C) selectable,     Direct Manual Focus (DMF), Manual Focus
stillimagefileformat: JPEG (DCF Ver. 2.0, Exif Ver.2.3, MPF Baseline     compliant), RAW (Sony ARW 2.3format), 3D MPO (MPF Extended compliant)
drivemode: Single-shot, Continuous, Speed Priority, Self-timer,     Continuous Self-timer, Bracketing
cameratype: Sony E-mount interchangeable lens digital camera
lcdtype: 3.0" TFT Xtra Fine LCD (921,600 pixels) w/TruBlack     technology
phototvhd: Yes, with BRAVIA Sync enabled HDTV and HDMI cable
creativestyle: Standard, Vivid, Neutral, Clear, Deep, Light,     Portrait, Landscape, Sunset, Night Scene, Autumn leaves, Black & White,     Sepia (Contrast (-3 to +3steps), Saturation(-3 to +3steps), Sharpness(-3     to +3steps))
colortemperature: 2500 - 9900 k with 15-step each Magenta/Green     compensation (G7 to M7), Amber/Blue (A7 to B7)
autohighdynamicrange: Yes, (Auto Exposure Difference, Exposure difference     Level (1-6 EV at 1.0 EV step), off)
microphonespeaker: Built-in stereo microphone; Built-in, monaural speaker
imagingsensor: Exmor APS HD CMOS sensor (23.5 X 15.6mm)
scenemodes: Portrait, Landscape, Macro, Sports action, Sunset,     Night portrait, Night View, Handheld Twilight
exposuresettings: iAUTO, Program AE (P), Aperture priority (A), Shutter     priority (S), Manual (M), Sweep Panorama (2D), 3D Sweep Panorama, Anti     Motion Blur, Scene Selection
lenscompatibility: Sony E-mount lens, (Sony A-mount lenses when used with     LA-EA1 or LA-EA2 lens adaptor)
